metadata.title: CVE-2023-5421 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An attacker who is logged into OTRS as an user with privileges to createand change customer user data may manipulate the CustomerID field toexecute JavaScript code that runs immediatly after the data is saved.Theissue onlyoccurs if the configuration forAdminCustomerUser::UseAutoComplete was changed before. This issue affectsOTRS: from 7.0.X before 7.0.47, from 8.0.X before 8.0.37; ((OTRS))Community Edition: from 6.0.X through 6.0.34.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
